q: how dangerous is the sport of pushing the ice pot
pred: The sport of pushing the ice pot is not inherently dangerous. However, it is important to note that the sport requires a certain level of skill and balance to perform well. In the video, the man is seen pushing the ice pot on the ice and is seen falling. It is essential to practice and develop the necessary skills to avoid falls and injuries while playing the sport. It is also important to wear appropriate safety gear, such as helmets and pads, to minimize the risk of injury in case of a fall.
